title: Digital Photography Education Design Using Mercypeaking: Integrating Theory and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills, Understanding of Scientific Inquiry Methods
context.additional_context: Photographic skills training course design using VR/simulations with limited budget/resources. Students learn through hands-on practice with personal digital devices and team projects

learning_goals: Students can plan creative photography projects on a low budget by applying macrophotography techniques
Students can explain core photographic skills such as light control, composition, and color correction in VR environments using scientific principles
Students can form teams of three, plan and execute a community issue-themed photography project, and present the results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
